description: This source file is a Spring Boot REST controller class, ProductController, which manages CRUD operations for products. It provides endpoints for creating, listing, retrieving by ID, updating, and deleting products, with documentation annotations for Swagger/OpenAPI.

classes.name: ProductController
classes.description: REST controller for managing product CRUD operations, handling HTTP requests and responses.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Handles HTTP POST to create a new product, returning the created product with URI location.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Handles HTTP GET to list all products.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Handles HTTP GET to retrieve a product by its ID.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Handles HTTP PUT to update an existing product by ID.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Handles HTTP DELETE to delete a product by ID.
